thread.title: Karen Watson
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Karen Watson

author: Karen Watson
title: Karen Watson
text:
After several months of being unable to get the shoes of choice in my local ECCO store, it was wonderful to discover them via the Ecco eu online process for half the price in the clearance basket. The purchase was secure and easy. The shoes were well packaged and could be tracked on their journey. Delivery was swift and effective.
My mother was delighted with her gift. I would certainly recommend the website and this mechanism for shoe shopping!
Well done and then you to all. You deserve 5 stars.!
